How many people are affected by MECP2-related severe neonatal encephalopathy ?,MECP2-related severe neonatal encephalopathy is likely a rare condition. Twenty to 30 affected males have been reported in the scientific literature.,GHR,MECP2-related severe neonatal encephalopathy
